title: Unique per-item placeholder images matched to marble art names

requirements.summary: Add unique, category-matching static placeholder images so each item card shows a distinct image per item within every collection section.
acceptanceCriteria: In each collection section (Krishna, Ganesha, Shiva, Parvati, Handmade Human Portraits, Marble Structures, Other Gods), each of the 4 item cards displays a different image (no single image reused for all items in that section).
Images for Shiva items look distinct from Parvati items, which look distinct from Human Portrait items, which look distinct from Marble Structures items (clear visual differentiation by category).
All item images are served from local static paths under /assets/generated (no external URLs).
